### Article 1: How unstructured data turns your business into a junk drawer - and how to fix it

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://www.techradar.com/pro/how-unstructured-data-turns-your-business-into-a-junk-drawer-and-how-to-fix-it)

## Summary

This article does not contain news about vendor 'unstructured' but rather discusses general IDP market challenges through thought leadership content from DocuWare's Regional VP Marcin Pichur. The piece focuses on how unstructured data creates operational inefficiencies across Finance, HR, and Operations departments, positioning Intelligent Document Processing as a solution for transforming document clutter into structured insights. While the article validates the IDP market category, it contains no specific information about the vendor 'unstructured' or developments that would directly impact their business.
